mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discord_log (discord_log_command, discord_log_is_success, discord_log_content, discord_log_channel_id, discord_log_guild_id, discord_log_user_id, discord_log_user_tag) VALUES (#{discord_log_command}, #{discord_log_is_success}, #{discord_log_content}, #{discord_log_channel_id}, #{discord_log_guild_id}, #{discord_log_user_id}, #{discord_log_user_tag})
